sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: As the fight for Sudan rages on, more than 400 civilians have died and thousands injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Amid fears that Russia might encourage migrants to cross it, Poland beefs up its border with the exclave of Kaliningrad.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Smoke hovers over Khartoum as fighting continued in parts of Sudan's capital, which has been turned into the front lines of the conflict between the country's two warring generals despite the extension of a ceasefire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Ordinary civilians are caught in the crossfires.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: With more than 411 people killed in the past two weeks, another 2,023 have been injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: That number is expected to rise.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The roads to Sudan's borders are packed with people trying to flee the conflict.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: So far, around 50,000 people, mostly women and children,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: have fled into neighboring countries.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: International evacuations are still being carried out, including this group of Iranians who touched down in Saudi Arabia on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Poland's Prime Minister Mateusz Morawiecki has, że poza granicą z Rosją,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: w Klinigradzie, będzie jeszcze bardziej wzmocniona, by pozostawić migranci.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Polska boi się, że Rosja może wzmocnić migranci, a także refugi, by próbować wziąć z jej terytorium Unię Europejską. Na całym pasie przygranicznym będziemy budowali odpowiednie zabezpieczenia zarówno fizyczne jak i elektroniczne.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: To jest tak zwana perymetria. Rozwijamy tę perymetrię. Będziemy również wzmacniali obecność Straży Granicznej, wszystkich służb.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ta obecność już jest wzmocniona, ale będziemy kontynuowali ten cały proces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: but we will continue this whole process.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Fears were raised back in November after reports that Moscow's aviation authority had started to launch flights from the Middle East and North Africa to Kaliningrad.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And there are worries that the war in Ukraine makes the border more vulnerable to both spying and sabotage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Hundreds of migrants are trapped between Chilean and Peruvian police as officials prevent them from passing into Peru.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: They're in a precarious situation without access to food, water or shelter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Lima and Santiago have held talks to try to resolve the situation, but they were unable to find a solution. De igual manera hemos acordado el establecimiento de un mecanismo técnico a nivel de vicecancilleres en el que se tratará esta problemática que no es solo coyuntural, sino que es una problemática que abarca el nivel regional y por lo tanto vamos a incluir también en este diálogo a nuestras contrapartes de los otros países vecinos.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Muchos están atrapados porque no tienen los papeles correctos para cruzar la frontera, pero dicen que solo quieren pasar por Perú. Many are trapped because they don't have the right papers to cross the border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But they say they just want to pass through Peru, on their way to other destinations, just returning home to Venezuela or going on to the United States.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And some are traveling with young and vulnerable children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: More than 2,000 journalists, lawmakers and celebrities gathered in Washington for its annual White House Correspondents Dinner.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And its main course, jokes about President Joe Biden's age.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: One comedian mocked Biden for running for second term in the White House, saying that while in France, people are rioting because they don't want to work until 64, in the U.S., they are begging to work until their mid-80s.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: want to work until 64. In the U.S., they are begging to work until their mid-80s. The dinner is meant to celebrate press freedom and freedom of speech and usually involves roasting the country's sitting president.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In his sermon at Sunday Mass in Budapest, Pope Francis hinted that Hungary should change its closed-doors approach to migrants and refugees. Francis was on his third and final day of his visit to Hungary which is one of the EU's most anti-migrant states and has the closest relations with Russia. and the closed doors. The closed doors of our selfishness towards those who walk next to us every day, the closed doors of our individualism, the closed doors towards those who are foreign, different, migrant, poor.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: During his visit, the Pope has thanked Hungarians for welcoming so many Ukrainian refugees.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Even so, Prime Minister Viktor Orban's support for Ukraine is weaker than the rest of Europe, and that has annoyed many European leaders.
